document.full_text: general motors co  said on wednesday that it will make 60,000 chevrolet volt and opel ampera in 2012, up from its previously announced 45,000 production outlook.
document.title: gm ups volt, ampera production outlook
lines_and_colors: general motors co  said on wednesday that it will make 60,000 chevrolet volt and opel ampera in 2012, up from its previously announced 45,000 production outlook.
